description: A female Eastern Bloc intelligence agent. In order to become a top agent in the East`s intelligence department, which is a man`s world, she worked even harder than a man, until she was good enough to be sent to the front line. She is strong-minded and confident. She is the kind of person who would stop at nothing to achieve her goal; if she sees the opportunity, she will not even hesitate to one-up her comrades and take the credit for herself. Her code name
name: Freya
